required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioavailability Study of Levetiracetam Tablets, 750 mg of Dr. Reddy's Under Fasting Conditions.
clinical_study.official_title: Comparative, Randomized, Single-Dose, 2-way Crossover Bioavailability Study of Dr. Reddy's Levetiracetam Tablets, 750 mg and Keppra® 750 mg Tablets of UCB Pharma in Healthy Adult Male Volunteers Under Fasting Conditions.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the single-dose relative bioavailability study of Levetiracetam Tablets 750 mg with Keppra® 750 mg Tablets under Fasting conditions.

detailed_description.textblock: This is an open-label, randomized, single-dose 2-way crossover relative bioavailability study in healthy adult male volunteers under fasting conditions with a washout period of 7 days.

primary_outcome.measure: Bioavailability based on Cmax and AUC parameters

arm_group.description: Levetiracetam Tablets, 750 mg of Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Limited
Keppra® 750 mg Tablets of UCB Pharma Inc.,

intervention.description: Levetiracetam Tablets, 750 mg of Dr. Reddy's Laboratories Limited

responsible_party.name_title: Mr. M.S. Mohan / Senior Manager - R&D
